## BoardStyle3

> Use
```javascript
  <board-style-3
    sid='board3'
    source='80'
    ref='board3'
  />
```

> Props

参数|说明|类型|可选值|默认值
-|-|-|-|-|
sid|组件id|string|-|'board3'
source|数据源|string|-|'80'
options|配置项|object|-|options

> options

参数|说明|类型|可选值|默认值
-|-|-|-|-|
subtext|副标题文本|string|-|'今日事件'
subtextStyle|副标题样式|object|-|{}
sourceStyle|中间值样式|object|-|{}
